basic_data.cell_line_alt_name: CANVAS3-2 Het GC; C3-2 Het GC

publications.title: Generation and heterozygous repair of human iPSC lines from three individuals with cerebellar ataxia, neuropathy and vestibular areflexia syndrome (CANVAS) carrying biallelic AAGGG expansions in RFC1

donor.disease_description: Biallelic AAGGG repeat expansions in RFC1
donor.disease_name: Cerebellar ataxia, neuropathy, and vestibular areflexia syndrome (CANVAS)

genomic_modifications.description: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated deletion of the AAGGG expansion in intron 2 of RFC1 resulting in a heterozygous gene-corrected allele

genomic_characterisation.summary: SNP array (0.5 Mb resolution) showed 46,XX with no aneuploidies or large insertions/deletions.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: pEP4 E02S ET2K; pEP4 E02S EN2L; pEP4 E02S EM2K

ethics.institutional_HREC: Human Research Ethics Committee of the Royal Children's Hospital
